Name: Pago Pago Cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: A Pineapple Daiquiri with two liqueurs giving a herbal chocolate influence.
History: Adapted from Jeff Berry's Beachbum Berry Remixed , and, according to Jeff, originally from a 1940 book called The How and When by Hyman Gale and Gerald F. Marco (although it doesn't appear under this name in our 1945 Third Revised Edition of the book).
Nutrition: One serving of Pago Pago Cocktail contains 203 calories
